name: places/ChIJsepRl4dZwokRPleEQYioneE
adrFormatAddress: 1028 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10022-4052, USA

originalText.text: J’s cleaners does excellent work, is quick, and provides great customer service. Everyone at the cleaners is so nice and cares about their customers.  I especially appreciate Pete who personally delivered my clothes from the plant to the 2d Ave. location after hours, so that I would have my clothes available for me to pick up before a trip.  The 24/7 kiosk is also a great convenience.  I recommend J’s Cleaners.

text.text: J’s cleaners does excellent work, is quick, and provides great customer service. Everyone at the cleaners is so nice and cares about their customers.  I especially appreciate Pete who personally delivered my clothes from the plant to the 2d Ave. location after hours, so that I would have my clothes available for me to pick up before a trip.  The 24/7 kiosk is also a great convenience.  I recommend J’s Cleaners.

originalText.text: Very professional and reliable. They put a tiny barcode inside your clothes on a seam. Their operation is fully computerized and automated so that human errors can be avoided. Their 24/7 Kiosk enable you to drop off or pick up your clothes at any time of the day. Even at midnight.

text.text: Very professional and reliable. They put a tiny barcode inside your clothes on a seam. Their operation is fully computerized and automated so that human errors can be avoided. Their 24/7 Kiosk enable you to drop off or pick up your clothes at any time of the day. Even at midnight.

originalText.text: Don’t send your clothes here. They put an nonremovable sticker on your clothes and when they iron your shirts, it’s all wrinkled and damaged. New York dry cleaning isn’t great but this is def bottom of the list bad

originalText.text: Excellent. The cleaning always comes out great. The tailoring is always right on and reasonably priced.

originalText.text: Super fast (needed a suit tailored in 1 day) and friendly!
